Name: Soup en Zo

Review Text: Great soup as always but portions seem smaller than before and the small piece of bread that was complementary is not anymore.

Review Text: Everyday a selection of 8 - 10 soups and 3 - 4 salads, all freshly made which makes this place a healthy and tasty option to get lunch! ‚Ä¶

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Best Soup in the universe! THEY really bring together all international kitchens into a number of different soups. Really must try the soup from Enzo.  On better then the other! Cant wait!

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Every once in a while there is something neat about a place and the experience of that place. The food was tasty. The service was friendly enough. The place is simple. From the weather being right for it, to the folks sitting next to me being friendly.  It really made me think a certain "jai ne se quoi." (9/22/15)

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Fantastic soup, satiating, tasty and vegan. Not all items on the menu are vegan, but there is plenty deliciousness to chose from for a vegan. I had a lentil soup, large portion is for a properly hungry person, very filling. I do recommend :)

Name: Soup en Zo

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: The staff was really nice but the peanut soup was a real disappointment. It is supposed to be with chicken and salted meat. In a whole large portion of soup, there was only one super tiny piece of chicken. Basically no meat.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: We were aiming to have a quick-nice lunch. Here The soups were amazing, many friendly veg meals and the staff was kind and patienve w us, even they offer us to try the soups before ordering! :)

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text:
Soup en zo is fabulous, they actually made me change my opinion on soups.
The staff is super friendly and even make you try soups before you order.
They have different menu's everyday, with soup for vegans or vegetarians as much as soup with chicken or other meats.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Really tasty vegan, vegetarian and non-veg soups in different sizes and lots of variation. Usually about three or four vegan options. Served with a small piece of bread, but they also have varying salads/side dishes etc. ‚Ä¶

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Very friendly staff, healthy and (most importantly) incredibly delicious soups! The menu is short and simple but you'll still have a hard time picking just one of the creative and tasty flavors offered. With several different sizes available, it's a perfect spot for a quick snack or a hearty meal. Highly recommended!

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: Um, YUM. Delicious soup. Team is friendly once open but not so much if you wander in before opening hours (door open). Reminds me a bit of the Seinfeld sketch. Delicious soup, bread and salads. Gets crowded quickly. Read the board to see what's available, changes daily.

Name: Soup en Zo
Review Text: If you want something light, healthy and easy to digest kind of food that‚Äôs tasty, this is the place! After a couple of big nights in Amsterdam this place certainly balances things out. Yum!
